[]
Appending three views
["first","second","third"]
Creating new TabbedLocation
["first","second","third"]
Re-order tabs
["third","first","second"]
Creating new TabbedLocation
["third","first","second"]
["third","first","second","fourth"]
Creating new TabbedLocation
["third","first","second","fourth"]
Closing second tab
["third","first","fourth"]
Creating new TabbedLocation
["third","first","fourth"]
